QuestData.Title: Back in the Saddle
QuestData.Description: Our situation is growing a bit desperate, $r.$b$bWe must focus our attention on the naga and their prisoners, but it would be folly to do so without being prepared, and down here that means finding a way to travel more quickly.$b$bThese sharks are clearly fond of sea turtle. Let's see if we can turn that into our advantage.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use 6 Turtle Meat to create shark bait.
